import React from "react" import Modal from 'react-modal'; export type Props = { isOpen: boolean onRequestClose: () => void style: object } const InfoModal: React.FC = ({isOpen, onRequestClose, style}) => { Modal.setAppElement('#root'); console.log('KJGNKJSRG', isOpen, onRequestClose, style) return (
X

Who is behind this project?

I am Lisa, a Ukrainian from Kharkiv, who has lived in Germany for the past 16 years.

What was my motivation for this project?

To give people who don't speak ua/ru an opportunity to donate directly to local volunteers as money donated to big funds doesn't trickle down to grassroot initiatives.

How are charities/orgs being selected?

I manually select and verify them. Some of them (like Come Back Alive) are well-established some have come into existence only recently. However, all of them provide reports on where the money is being spent.
) } export default InfoModal
